title: Gingerbread biscuit gift in a jar
ingredients: ['250g plain flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '200g plain flour', '2 teaspoons ground ginger', '1 teaspoon ground cloves', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon ground allspice', '220g dark brown soft sugar']
